EmailTemplate.description: Entering the Corian® Quality Network - EN Version
EmailTemplate.name: BI-EMEA QN Entering EN
EmailTemplate.subject: Entering the Corian® Quality Network
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Qualification__c.Contact__c},
We have received the request to make your company a Qualified Quality Network Member and are sending you herewith the link with your “DuPont™ Corian® Quality Network” contract.
May we kindly ask you to print out two copies of the “DuPont™ Corian® Quality Network” agreement; paragraph each page of the contracts and stamp and sign the last page, before you sent them both back to the following address:
DuPont de Nemours (Belgium) BVBA Attn {!Qualification__c.Owner__c} Departement CORIAN® Building Innovations - KGB4 Antoon Spinoystraat 6 2800 Mechelen Belgium
Afterwards you will receive 1 copy back with some “DuPont™ Corian® Quality Network” supporting material.
In case of questions, do not hesitate to contact us.
Friendly Regards,
{!Qualification__c.Owner__c} DuPont Building Innovations – Surfaces Quality Network Assistant Warranty Centre Corian® Email: BI-Warranty@dupont.com www.corian.com
